citations.narrative:
The licensee acquired a prairie dog in April 2024, however acquisition records were incomplete. Acquisition records must
contain the required information as per this section of the AWA. Required information pertaining to regulated species
acquired by the facility must be documented and available for review by APHIS officials during inspections.
********Correct by 2-15-25 and for all future acquisitions
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The licensee acquired a prairie dog in April 2024, however acquisition records were incomplete. Acquisition records must 
contain the required information as per this section of the AWA. Required information pertaining to regulated species 
acquired by the facility must be documented and available for review by APHIS officials during inspections.  
********Correct by 2-15-25 and for all future acquisitions 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
